scripts.optmize-css: postcss src/css/styles.css --use autoprefixer cssnano postcss-pxtorem --output dist/css/styles.css --no-map
scripts.transpile-js: babel src/js/script.js -o dist/js/script.js --presets=@babel/preset-env && babel src/js/result.js -o dist/js/result.js --presets=@babel/preset-env
scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run optmize-css && npm run transpile-js && npm run minify-js-1 && npm run minify-js-2
